summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eleventh Avenue Northwest, from the existing sewer in West Sixty-fifth Street to West Eighty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5418 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
